description:
Ever seen Katsushika Hokusai's famous painting, Great Wave Off Kanagawa? Probably. But have you ever seen it painted on somebody's lips? Probably not.你曾见过葛饰北斋的著名版画《神奈川海浪》吗？可能见过。但你见过画在某人嘴唇上的《神奈川海浪》吗？可能没有。

Because that's precisely what Canadian makeup artist Andrea Reed has done. And as you can see from the pictures below, she doesn't just stop there. Tartan lips? No problem. Lips made to look like leaves? You got it. Honeycomb lips? All in a day's work for this amazingly skillful makeup artist.因为这就是加拿大化妆师安德里亚·里德的作品。正如你从下列照片中看到的，她并没有止步于此。格子纹嘴唇？没问题。嘴唇看起来像叶子？你也看到了。蜂巢状的嘴唇？对这位技巧熟练的化妆师而言，这些作品不过就是一天的功夫。

Going by the name Girl Grey Beauty, Reed's ability to turn her lips into stunning works of art has earned her an Instagram following of more than 100,000 people. And it's easy to see why. How does she do it? Our lips are sealed, but you might learn a thing or two by checking out her video tutorials.里德在Instagram上以Girl Grey Beauty（女孩灰色美）自称，她能将嘴唇变成绝佳艺术品，这一技能为她在Instagram上赢得了超过100,000名粉丝。原因是显而易见的。她是怎样做到的？我们并不清楚，但你可以看一下她的视频教程来学习一二。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 化妆师在嘴唇上也能作画？惊悚or惊为天人？

description:
Finding a supportive, well-fitting bra can be a struggle for women of any age. While size plays a part, the width and length of your breasts and the direction they point is, as well as where they're placed on your chest, is also important.找到支撑力度好、尺寸合适的文胸对于任何年龄的女性而言都得花一番力气。尽管尺寸大小很重要，但胸部形状、偏正程度和所在位置也都很重要。

快来看一看你是属于哪种胸型吧？你真的选对文胸了吗？

1. Round1.圆形

If your breasts are a round shape and are equally full on top and bottom, then you're lucky enough not to need too much support. You can probably get away with a thin bra without underwire as you don't need to change the position of your breasts.若你的胸部呈圆形，且上下丰满，那你很幸运，无需过多支撑。一个薄薄的无钢圈文胸足矣，因为你不需要挪动胸的位置。

2. East West2.一个朝东一个朝西

If you have smaller breasts that gravitate to the outside of the chest then you're an East West. A t-shirt bra will help to create a smooth silhouette and pull the breasts in, giving you a more streamlined shape.如果你胸部稍小且向外扩，那你就是一东一西型。带文胸的T恤有助塑造曲线，收紧你的胸部、调整胸形。

3. Side Set3.两边型

Side set breasts are fuller than East Wests but still fall outwards, and there's also a wide space between breasts. The best bra for you is a plunge bra, which will pull the breasts up and in.两边型比一东一西型饱满，但仍旧往外扩，胸部收不拢。最好的文胸即低胸款，帮你提升和提拉。

4. Slender4.纤瘦型

Breasts that are smaller at the top than they are at the bottom and are longer than they are wide are considered slender, especially if they're on the small side. A plunge bra will help to lift the breasts and you might want to consider padding for extra oomph.胸部若是上围小而下围大，长但不宽则是纤瘦型胸部，胸部偏小时尤为如此。低胸文胸有助提升胸部，若要显得更性感，你就要考虑用插片了。

5. Bell Shape5.铃铛形

If your breasts are slimmer at the top and fuller at the bottom, then you're a Bell Shape. You should choose something with plenty of material that offers good coverage.如果你的胸部上围稍小，而下围饱满，那你就是铃铛形。你应当选择有料的文胸，包裹好你的胸部。

6. Asymmetric6.不对称型

Almost all women have one breast that is larger than the other to some degree. And often it's barely noticeable. If your asymmetry is significant enough to cause a problem, then a bra with removable padding is your friend as you can remove it on the side of your larger breast.多数女性多多少少有大小胸，但通常不容易察觉。如果不对称很成问题，那么文胸插片则是你的好伙伴，稍大的那边你就可以不用插片。

7. Teardrop7.泪滴状

If your breasts are rounded but slightly less full at the top then you're lucky enough to be teardrop shaped. Teardrop breasts are suited to most styles of bra.如果胸部呈圆形，上围稍稍有些不饱满，那很幸运你是泪滴状胸型。泪滴状适合大多数文胸。

title: 你属于哪种胸型 你真的选对文胸了吗？
